name: Party Adventure
description:
A platformer adventure game about the birthday boy's dad and an unexpected visit by HUNGRY trolls. Will you pilot your super UFO, and follow the signs that lead you to the troll's castle?

A troll had to crash to party didn't it!?

Controls:

W,A,D: Move Around.

Right Click: Move On To Next Dialogue.

Left Click: Interaction With Home Screen.

Well I hope you enjoy playing the game :)

Imagine Galaxy
